TopicTitle: No heat on re-entry, solar panels dont break, impact at 100m\s and nothing broke but the engine

Articles.Content:
Hey there,

Built a simple craft, launched suborbital with AP around 140km, upon re-entry reaching 70km (2200m\s) solar panels were intact, at 50km - no plasma effects no atmospheric effects, been able to turn vessel engine-first using RCS (!!!), then vessel decelerated (like on rails, no physics) and impacted Kerbin surface at 100m\s engine-first with only part broken being said engine and the entire vessel bounced back (like rubber ball physics) and fell back with no damage...

 

p.s. damage is set to ON, particle effects on launch were drawn normally, rcs particle effects too...
